author: EmyrClement
body:
#### PR description:

This PR follows on from #43245 and adds the new emulator to the L1 sequence and event content.

Corresponding PR to [cms-1lt-offline #1204](https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/1204)

#### PR validation:

Ran a standard CMS driver command, see new products in output root file.

@pallabidas
title: Add emulated calo jets/taus to L1 sequence and event content.
